title: What if the World turned to Gold? - The Gold Apocalypse
author: Kurzgesagt – In a Nutshell
description:
The Map of Evolution and other sciency posters, researched and designed with love, are now available on the kurzgesagt shop. 
Your purchase will support us directly and keep our videos free for everyone. 
►► https://shop.kurzgesagt.org
(Worldwide Shipping Available)

Sources & further reading:
https://sites.google.com/view/sources-goldapocalypse/

Let us explore the scientific mystery of what would happen to you, if Earth suddenly turned into gold! The “Midaspocalypse”, based on the ancient tale of King Midas who was cursed so everything he touched turned into gold. 

OUR CHANNELS
▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀
German Channel: https://kgs.link/youtubeDE 
Spanish Channel: https://kgs.link/youtubeES 


HOW CAN YOU SUPPORT US?
▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀
This is how we make our living and it would be a pleasure if you support us!

Get Merch designed with ❤ from https://kgs.link/shop  
Join the Patreon Bird Army 🐧 https://kgs.link/patreon

localize.description:
进化地图和其他科学海报，经过研究和设计，现在可以在kurzgesagt商店购买。
您的购买将直接支持我们，并使我们的视频对所有人免费。
►► https://shop.kurzgesagt.org
(可提供全球运输服务)

来源和进一步阅读。
https://sites.google.com/view/sources-goldapocalypse/

让我们来探索一下科学的奥秘，如果地球突然变成金子，你会怎么样! Midaspocalypse "是根据古代国王Midas的故事改编的，他受到诅咒，所以他接触到的所有东西都会变成黄金。

我们的频道
▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀▀

localize.description:

您的購買將直接支持我們，並使我們的視頻對所有人免費。

(可提供全球運輸服務)

https://sites.google.com/view/sources-goldapocalypse/

讓我們來探索一下科學的奧祕，如果地球突然變成金子，你會怎麼樣! Midaspocalypse "是根據古代國王Midas的故事改編的，他受到詛咒，所以他接觸到的所有東西都會變成黃金。
